sentences.cn: “ 好了, 好了, ”希尔弗说, “ 别再唠叨这些了.

sentences.en: But with the stow of Abraham begins something more special to the Jewish race.
sentences.cn: 但从亚伯拉罕的故事起,对于犹太民族而言更为特殊的东西开始了.

sentences.en: I can't read if you are talking, so stow it!
sentences.cn: 如果你们谈话,我就没法看书, 所以不要再说了.

sentences.en: I helped her stow her bags in the boot of the car.
sentences.cn: 我帮她将包放进汽车行李箱里。

sentences.en: I'm very hungry, and I can now stow away an ox.
sentences.cn: 我真是饿极了, 现在我可以把一头牛吞下肚.

sentences.en: Luke stowed his camera bags into the boot.
sentences.cn: 卢克把他的相机袋收到旅行箱里。

sentences.en: Passengers are requested to stow their hand - baggage in the lockers above the seats.
sentences.cn: 旅客须将随身携带的行李放入座位上方的贮藏柜里.

sentences.en: Put all the fire - fighting equipment back in place and stow them away.
sentences.cn: 将所有消防设备归位并放好.

sentences.en: Stow away some money for a future business or career change.
sentences.cn: 试着积累一些资金,以便自己将来创业或者转行.

sentences.en: The passengers are ready to stow their bags and take their seats!
sentences.cn: 所有的乘客已放好自己的书包并坐在了座位上!

sentences.en: The stow he told us was at once interesting and instructive.
sentences.cn: 他讲给我们听的故事,既有趣,又有益.

sentences.en: There follows the most amazing stow of conquest in the whole history of our race.
sentences.cn: 后来发生了我们人类整个历史上最令人惊奇的征服故事.

sentences.en: Tom Morris , present - day owner of Ruskin Antiques, Stow - on - the - Wold, specialises in works made by the Movement's craftsmen.
sentences.cn: 在斯托昂泽沃尔德的拉斯金古玩店现在的店主汤姆 - 莫里斯, 专营工艺美术运动时代的手工艺者创作的作品.

sentences.en: Will you please tell me how to stow the optional cargo?
sentences.cn: 请告诉我怎样堆装选港货好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can stow your jewellery away in the bank.
sentences.cn: 你可以把你的珠宝存到银行里.

sentences.en: You should stow the frozen pork pieces fore and aft not crosswise.
sentences.cn: 你们要把冻猪肉前后堆放,不要交错.

phrases.tran_cn: 【非正式用语】 大吃…：贪婪地吃或饮（食物或饮料）

trans.tran_en: If you stow something somewhere, you carefully put it there until it is needed

trans.tran_cn: 装，装载，收藏，使暂停，堆装
